pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa bhikkhunupassayaṃ nissāya yavakhettaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:6.3: Bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi khette chaḍḍenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:6.4: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:7.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:7.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:12.2: calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:13.2: pubbaṇṇaṃ aparaṇṇaṃ yaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ropimaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:15.3: Sakiṃ āṇattā bahukampi chaḍḍeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:16.1: Harite haritasaññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:16.2: Harite vematikā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:16.3: Harite aharitasaññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:18.2: oloketvā chaḍḍeti, khettamariyāde chaḍḍeti sāmike āpucchitvā apaloketvā chaḍḍeti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
